SummaryEnglish: Five "Black Points" suddenly appeared around the world as portals to parallel worlds. Immediately after, strange creatures began their invasion from these portals. These creatures are the inhabitants of five worlds — the same worlds in different timeframes. In order to ensure their own future timeframe survives, each of the five invasion forces battle to wipe the other future timeframes out.

1.SummaryEnglish: A pact with a Z/X known as Rigel saves Azumi’s life. Finally able to live as a normal girl, Azumi starts a new year at an academy for humans and their Z/X partners.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chaos reigns as the onslaught against the academy continues. How can the new students withstand such strong enemy attacks?

3.SummaryEnglish: The students learn the truth behind the attack on the academy. The realms all face an existential threat and the time has come to unite against a common foe.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Rank E Team undergoes training from Hell, and the instructor’s methods may end up pushing the team too far...

5.SummaryEnglish: The Rank E and D Teams face off in a mock battle. But when Matoi panics and unleashes her power, her teammates find themselves caught in the crossfire.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mastering Overboost is the key to moving up the rankings. Unfortunately, Yuni reaches her breaking point because of the training and goes AWOL.

7.SummaryEnglish: Finals are here and the Rank E Team faces expulsion if they don’t pass. So, how is it fair that they’re going up against the Rank A Team first?

8.SummaryEnglish: Summer vacation is here at last, but that doesn’t mean the team can rest on their laurels.

9.SummaryEnglish: It’s time to say goodbye to the Student Council since its members are transferring overseas. Azumi wants to do something special and plans a farewell party for them.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Rank E team learns of the true enemy and why the realms have banded together.

11.SummaryEnglish: Betrayal cripples the academy’s combat capabilities. With reinforcements not coming, the Rank E Team must either fight or retreat.

12.SummaryEnglish: Will friendship be enough to win the day when the divine is an enemy?
